label: New Patients
heading: Your Journey to a Healthier Smile
description: We make getting started simple. Here's what to expect when you visit Summerville Dentistry.

steps.title: Schedule Your Visit
steps.description: Book online or give us a call. Our friendly team will find a time that works for your schedule at either our Augusta or Evans office.

steps.title: Comprehensive Exam
steps.description: We'll take digital x-rays, perform a thorough exam, and sit down with you to discuss your oral health goals and any concerns.

steps.title: Personalized Plan
steps.description: Your doctor creates a custom treatment plan tailored to your needs, budget, and timeline — with clear explanations every step of the way.

steps.title: Smile with Confidence
steps.description: From routine cleanings to advanced restorations, we deliver results that help you smile bigger and live healthier.
